AILoggingWrapper Class Reference

Inherits from AILogging : NSObject
Declared in AILoggingWrapper.h
AILoggingWrapper.m

Overview

  • This is wrapper for ‘AILogging’ class. It has component scope, that is component requesting for logging owns an instance of wrapper.
  • It encapsulates component details and forwards all logs calls/messages to ‘AILogging’ instance.

Other Methods

– initWithComponent:

Convenience initializer

- (instancetype)initWithComponent:(AIClientComponent *)component

Parameters

component

component requesting for logging wrapper

Return Value

Returns a logging wrapper object for given component

AILoggingWrapper.h
